isPublic.label: Public room
isPublic.description: Public rooms can be searched by other users

allowGuestJoin.label: Allow visitors to join
allowGuestJoin.description: Allow unregistered users to join the room as a guest

isEncrypted.label: Enable end-to-end encryption
isEncrypted.description: When enabled, messages in the room will be encrypted end-to-end
isEncrypted.alert: End-to-end encryption is enabled in the room, and this setting cannot be turned off.
